Compatible with iOS 12 (Mainly Tested on iPhone X with iOS 12.1.2).

NoNCHeaderView is a Tiny Tweak that Allows to Hide the New Notification Center Header Label on iOS 12!

If you donâ€™t Like the iOS 12 Notification Center Big Title Header, this Tweak Makes it Smoother and Cleaner!

The Tweak is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository (if you Have got that Version, Just Uninstall it and Install this New one).

No options to Configure.

See Screenshots below about How It Was Before and After.
